p: For a general understanding of the membrane reaction towards oil absorption, we selected the PS/0.5 wt.% CNT membrane irradiated with gamma ray of 15 kGy was selected for the oil/water separation test. For the experiment, hydraulic oil was selected as the model oil and it was dyed for a clear identification as shown in Figure 6a–d. The oil layer within the water was removed by a small piece of membrane, indicating the capability of the membrane for oil absorption. Figure 6e shows a snapshot of oil and water droplets on the PS/CNT nanofiber membrane. The oil droplets dropped on the surface of the PS/CNT membranes were absorbed completely and the oil contact angle was about 0°, showing superoleophilic property [ 22].
